reviews.review_msg: Dr Thomas is an awesome prof! I really do recommend this course. Ta was extremely harsh with marking but both ta and dr thomas was easy to confront for feedback. Take home essays were easy and you have a whole week to do them.

Without a doubt, Dr. Thomas is the BEST prof I've taken at SFU. Her class was the best ever, the lectures were engaging and you could clearly tell she was passionate about what she taught. The midterm and final were take-home short essays, and the photo essay was a blast! Cannot recommend her enough!
